title: Quinn win rate is 55% now
body: was high yesterday at 70's, now it's down to 50's, people are figuring out how to deal with her, yet Riot gona gutt her and nobody's gona pick this dumpser garbage champ anymore

replies.body: Holy jesus, Chill bud. They're not going to gut her. A small nerf does not equal gutting.  Calm down
Don't bother trying to reason with the whiny Quinn squad.

As a long-time Quinn fan, who's felt the sting of seeing the Valor kit evaporate, even I still found the reason within me to upvote your response. Honestly, despite loads of my own feedback disparaging the identity-shaping elements of the Quinn rework, I still find a lot of Quinn ragers are WAY too whiny, spouting apocalyptic characterizations of the Valor gutting.

Then again, that happens with every patch. You can't debuff Veigar by removing the damage from the poro sneezing next to him without some player declaring defcon 5. 

But I can still see the "Quinn squad" has already started to hate on your comment. Oh well. I'm with ya at least.

Her win rate is still > 55 and even 60 for the more experienced

I love my girl quinn but They need to remove shiv+firecannon stacking first

After that if the champs who abuse it are still a  problem they need to (Quinn-wise)

Increase the vision radius for rank 1-4 q

After that if quinn is still a problem 

Raise her passive CD to 10 but make it scale down to 3 (I'm not sure on the lowest cdr at max crit) seconds at 100% crit chance like it does currently

However I doubt after the vision nerf and firecannon+shiv cannon nerf happen quinn will need anything else
Or people found out she's at 70% win rate so every tom dick and Harry is playing her without a clue how to.
Hope they gut her. She's so OP now.
